G'day all,
Not Heianjo, I'm fairly sure of that.  I've seen similar tsuba but can't spit the name off the tip of my tongue!!  Nice piece, IMHO.

Regards - and a Happy New Year to all.

Barry Thomas
(Melbourne, Australia)
